name: .ZCI File Extension
summary: Learn about .ZCI files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a ZCI file with ZCI Publishing PowerCD (Windows). However, PowerCD is discontinued, and 64-bit versions of Windows cannot run it. Therefore, you may not be able to open your ZCI files in modern versions of Windows.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
